Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-2314 affecting package bcc for versions less than 0.29.1-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-2314 affecting package bcc for versions less than 0.29.1-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package bcc is earlier than 0.29.1-2, affected by CVE-2024-2314
